table.name: [dbo].[PhotoObj]
table.summary: The main PhotoObj table for the IRAS catalog
table.remarks: The main PhotoObj table for the IRAS catalog

column.name: [objID]
column.summary: unique object identifier

column.name: [name]
column.summary: IRAS Source Name

column.name: [ra]
column.summary: J2000 right ascension

column.name: [dec]
column.summary: J2000 declination

column.name: [cx]
column.summary: Cartesian coordinate x

column.name: [cy]
column.summary: Cartesian coordinate y

column.name: [cz]
column.summary: Cartesian coordinate z

column.name: [htmid]
column.summary: HTM ID

column.name: [zoneid]
column.summary: Zone ID

column.name: [err_maj]
column.summary: Uncertainty ellipse major axis

column.name: [err_min]
column.summary: Uncertainty ellipse minor axis

column.name: [err_ang]
column.summary: Uncertainty ellipse position angle

column.name: [nhcon]
column.summary: Number of times observed (<25)

column.name: [flux_12]
column.summary: Averaged non-color corrected flux density, 12 microns

column.name: [flux_25]
column.summary: Averaged non-color corrected flux density, 25 microns

column.name: [flux_60]
column.summary: Averaged non-color corrected flux density, 60 microns

column.name: [flux_100]
column.summary: Averaged non-color corrected flux density,100 microns

column.name: [fqual_12]
column.summary: flux density quality, 12 microns

column.name: [fqual_25]
column.summary: flux density quality, 25 microns

column.name: [fqual_60]
column.summary: flux density quality, 60 microns

column.name: [fqual_100]
column.summary: flux density quality,100 microns

column.name: [nlrs]
column.summary: Number of significant LRS spectra

column.name: [lrschar]
column.summary: Characterization of averaged LRS spectrum, __ is NULL

column.name: [relunc_12]
column.summary: Percent relative flux density uncertainties, 12 microns

column.name: [relunc_25]
column.summary: Percent relative flux density uncertainties, 25 microns

column.name: [relunc_60]
column.summary: Percent relative flux density uncertainties, 60 microns

column.name: [relunc_100]
column.summary: Percent relative flux density uncertainties,100 microns

column.name: [tsnr_12]
column.summary: Ten times the minimum signal-to-noise ratio, 12 microns

column.name: [tsnr_25]
column.summary: Ten times the minimum signal-to-noise ratio, 25 microns

column.name: [tsnr_60]
column.summary: Ten times the minimum signal-to-noise ratio, 60 microns

column.name: [tsnr_100]
column.summary: Ten times the minimum signal-to-noise ratio,100 microns

column.name: [cc_12]
column.summary: Point source correlation coefficient,_ is NULL, 12 microns

column.name: [cc_25]
column.summary: Point source correlation coefficient,_ is NULL, 25 microns

column.name: [cc_60]
column.summary: Point source correlation coefficient,_ is NULL, 60 microns

column.name: [cc_100]
column.summary: Point source correlation coefficient,_ is NULL,100 microns

column.name: [lvar]
column.summary: Percent Likelihood of Variability

column.name: [disc]
column.summary: Discrepant Fluxes flag (hex-encoded)

column.name: [confuse]
column.summary: Confusion flag (hex-encoded)

column.name: [pnearh]
column.summary: Number of nearby hours-confirmed point sources

column.name: [pnearw]
column.summary: Number of nearby weeks-confirmed point sources

column.name: [ses1_12]
column.summary: Number of seconds-confirmed nearby small extended sources, 12 microns

column.name: [ses1_25]
column.summary: Number of seconds-confirmed nearby small extended sources, 25 microns

column.name: [ses1_60]
column.summary: Number of seconds-confirmed nearby small extended sources, 60 microns

column.name: [ses1_100]
column.summary: Number of seconds-confirmed nearby small extended sources,100 microns

column.name: [ses2_12]
column.summary: Number of nearby weeks-confirmed small extended sources, 12 microns

column.name: [ses2_25]
column.summary: Number of nearby weeks-confirmed small extended sources, 25 microns

column.name: [ses2_60]
column.summary: Number of nearby weeks-confirmed small extended sources, 60 microns

column.name: [ses2_100]
column.summary: Number of nearby weeks-confirmed small extended sources,100 microns

column.name: [hsdflag]
column.summary: Source is located in high source density bin (hex-encoded)

column.name: [cirr1]
column.summary: Number of nearby 100 micron only WSDB sources

column.name: [cirr2]
column.summary: Spatially filtered 100 micron sky brightness ratio to flux density of point source (see text)

column.name: [cirr3]
column.summary: Total 100 micron sky surface brightness

column.name: [nid]
column.summary: Number of positional associations

column.name: [idtype]
column.summary: Type of Object

column.name: [mhcon]
column.summary: Possible number of HCONs, 99 for NULL

column.name: [fcor_12]
column.summary: Flux correction factor applied (times 1000),9999 is NULL, 12 microns

column.name: [fcor_25]
column.summary: Flux correction factor applied (times 1000),9999 is NULL, 25 microns

column.name: [fcor_60]
column.summary: Flux correction factor applied (times 1000),9999 is NULL, 60 microns

column.name: [fcor_100]
column.summary: Flux correction factor applied (times 1000),9999 is NULL,100 microns
